title: A most excellent and rare drink, pleasant and profitable for young and old people, that may be administered at all times, ...
author: J. H.
notes: Title from opening lines of text.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "London. And at the signe of the golden lion in the long walke between christ church and Snt. Bartholowmews hospitall".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
